frontmatter.title: Kafka Connect
frontmatter.description: Work done to develop the Kafka Connect feature in the Event Streams UI, and extend it.

internal.content:
---
title: Kafka Connect
description: Work done to develop the Kafka Connect feature in the Event Streams UI, and extend it.
---

## Summary
Kafka Connect is a capability that allows the bulk movement of data in and out of Event Streams. We created an interface to make the set up of Kafka Connect much easier and have strengthened it through several releases.

## Summary
Kafka Connect is a capability that allows the bulk movement of data in and out of Event Streams. We created an interface to make the set up of Kafka Connect much easier and have strengthened it through several releases.
